1: @@//steng 'og <mistake>thugs</mistake> kyi <mistake>rtsag</mistake> <mistake>nyis</mistake> <mistake>dag /mun</mistake> can <mistake>zu</mistake> ba <mistake>'bab</mistake> <mistake>ma'o// thabs</mistake> kyi thugs ni mun ba <mistake>can//khu</mistake> ba <mistake>'bab</mistake> ma shes rab <mistake>kyi// steng</mistake> 'og <mistake>rigs</mistake> <mistake>drug</mistake> 'di rnams <mistake>ni// ku</mistake> <mistake>gsung/</mistake>
2: thugs <mistake>kyi</mistake> rnal <mistake>'byorls//shes</mistake> rab thabs dngos yan <mistake>laggis//lus</mistake> can kun la <mistake>yang</mistake> dag <mistake>gnas//'chi</mistake> ltas lus <mistake>gag</mistake> rtsa dag <mistake>la// steng</mistake> 'og lhag pa'i rlung rnams <mistake>kyis//mun</mistake> can <mistake>khu ba</mistake>
3: <mistake>'hab</mistake> ma <mistake>la//skye</mistake> ba dang ni <mistake>'chib</mistake> <mistake>gnas//skyedang</mistake> <mistake>cchi</mistake> dang 'khrig pa <mistake>yi//dus</mistake> su khub 'bab <mistake>pa'o// mun</mistake> can ma yang steng du <mistake>'bab//ni</mistake> ma'i <mistake>llhob</mistake> <mistake>mnham</mistake> pa <mistake>la//dus</mistake> sbyor <mistake>'chad</mistake> ba'i <mistake>mdon</mistake> <mistake>mtshams</mistake>
4: <mistake>suu</mistake> <mistake>dbu ma</mistake> nas <mistake>na</mistake> <mistake>mtnam</mistake> pa <mistake>'bab//rkang</mistake> <mistake>bdang</mistake> bcas lnga bcu <mistake>drug /'byung</mistake> dang 'jug <mistake>pa'o mi</mistake> <mistake>yi</mistake> <mistake>bdag /bdun</mistake> cu rtsa <mistake>lnas</mistake> lhag pa <mistake>yi// drug</mistake> brgya nyin dang mtshan <mistake>la'o//drug</mistake> brgya rnams <mistake>kyi</mistake>
5: lhag pa <mistake>yi//stong</mistake> phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig <mistake>po//'ag yis</mistake> <mistake>dman</mistake> pa gang de <mistake>rnams//g.yon</mistake> dang <mistake>g.yas</mistake> ba'i rtsar 'bab po // phyogs gsum <mistake>danga</mistake> <mistake>bmas</mistake> <mistake>lo</mistake> <mistake>gsum</mistake> <mistake>rnams/ / lo</mistake> brgya rnams las dbu <mistake>ma'o//</mistake>
6: steng du <mistake>g.yon</mistake> <mistake>g.yas</mistake> zla nyi <mistake>ma//brkyang</mistake> ma lug dang ser <mistake>sky</mistake> <mistake>gzhan //chu</mistake> dang me yi rang bzhin <mistake>can //pad+ma</mistake> <mistake>an</mistake> chen 'dzin par <mistake>'dod //'og</mistake> tu bshang gci <mistake>'pab</mistake> pa <mistake>dag /sa</mistake> <mistake>dang</mistake> <mistake>rlung</mistake> <mistake>gi rang</mistake> <mistake>bzhin can//</mistake>
7: <mistake>rdbu</mistake> ma'i <mistake>rtsadng</mistake> <mistake>g.yon</mistake> pa <mistake>yang//'khor</mistake> lo ral gri 'dzin par <mistake>'dong// stang</mistake> dang 'og tu dbu ma <mistake>g.yas // sgra</mistake> gcan khu ba rab 'bab <mistake>pa// stong</mistake> pa ye shes rang bzhin <mistake>can// do</mistake> rje <mistake>rd</mistake> rje <mistake>'din</mistake> par <mistake>'dod</mistake>
8: zla ba'i lam gyis <mistake>bshad</mistake> ba'i <mistake>rtsa// nyi</mistake> mas <mistake>gcipg</mistake> <mistake>'bb</mistake> <mistake>pa</mistake> <mistake>ste//skye</mistake> 'chi mnyam pa chags pa <mistake>la//sgra</mistake> gcan <mistake>blub</mistake> rab tu <mistake>'bab// lte</mistake> <mistake>ma'i</mistake> steng du kun 'dar <mistake>ma//gang</mistake> de <mistake>m d</mistake> bzang mun pa
